items.content_html: DressTiny is a lightweight e-commerce platform built for the fashion industry, created as a college project. Built using basic JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3, the project demonstrates modern front-end development techniques without external frameworks, with an emphasis on clean architecture and responsive design.
items.title: 707mac/DressTiny: DressTiny is a lightweight e-commerce platform built for the fashion industry, created as a college project. Built using basic JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3, the project demonstrates modern front-end development techniques without external frameworks, with an emphasis on clean architecture and responsive design.
